ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are grateful to the numerous institutions and individuals who provided and assembled primary data for the database at the Canadian Facility for Ecoinformatics Research. This research was supported by Discovery Grant and Discovery Accelerator Supplement funds to JTK, as well as the University Research Chair in Macroecology & Conservation from the University of Ottawa. Thanks also to Jessica Forrest, Heather Kharouba, Peter Soroye and anonymous reviewers for providing helpful comments and feedback on the manuscript.
